QuestData.Title: Darkheart Thicket: Into Darkheart Thicket
QuestData.Description:
Beneath the boughs of Shaladrassil, Xavius extends his power to twist and torment the once-pure druid grove.
Not only this, but Xavius has taken a prize from among the druids, and his revenge will be slow and painful. We should go to Darkheart Thicket and stop his wicked plans.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat the Shade of Xavius in Darkheart Thicket.

Objectives.Objective: Defeat the Shade of Xavius in Darkheart Thicket
